chapter.title: Deployment Scenarios
chapter.para: Depending on the target use of Cyrus IMAP, different features and architectures may be used to make optimal use of the Cyrus IMAP features. This chapter briefly touches different deployment scenarios.

section.title: Single Server Deployments
section.para: In a deployment scenario with a single server, use this checklist to make sure you get the right scalability and functionality;
